name: StudyBreak
0:
”Alexa open study break”
”Alexa start study break”
”Alexa, start studying”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: study break
des:
Study Break provides continuous break reminders to help you avoid study burnout. You can customize your study session by setting study and break time durations or use the default of 45 minute study sessions with 15 minute breaks.

To customize study session say: "Alexa, set study time" and "Alexa, set break time"
To start studying with default or custom study times say: "Alexa, start studying"

View the demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jYXtEtiEtj0
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
